CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 10, 1951, pg. 2, reads: "Junk Yard Outlawed - Inspector John Flavin ordered Mrs. Della Gaines to clean up her junk yard, shown above, within 48 hours after she was arrested for violating a city ordinance Monday. Mrs. Gaines was fined $50 in police court.  The yard is located at 320 Kirkpatrick Street.  The lot is littered with ice boxes, stoves, beds [illegible] out into the street.  Police also arrested [ill.] Brooks, and towed away a truck with [ill.] - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Boys standing in front of pile of appliances and junk, 320 Kirkpatrick Street, Hill District
